alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 11:44AM AKST until November 18 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Rain, freezing rain, and snow is occurring. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. Freezing rain is expected in Unalakleet, with a chance of freezing rain in other areas. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Driving and walking surfaces will become very slippery as ice forms on the ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and freezing rain will change to snow this afternoon. Freezing rain is likely in Unalakleet, with just a chance of freezing rain in other areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
